placeholderDecoded: Here will be the decoded text / Put the decoded text here.

general.explanation: I use a lot of online tools myself and thanks to ads and cookie banners, the experience is not really that great. So I thought I'm going to build a couple of tools myself whenever I have time and see what I can do. Maybe even have some webassembly tools like image converter or similar things. Tools that could be used offline as well. Let's see where this goes.
general.toolsIWantToBuild:
JWT extractor
Image converter
Video to GIF converter
general.stuffToDo: Things I may want to build:
general.noteAboutParaglide: Oh, and I'm going to try out this localisation that was added by sv create: ParaglideJS.
general.seoDescription: A small collection of helpful tools, so I don't have to endure ads. Contains a few encoding and conversion tools.
general.title: Narigo's Toolbox

atonNifConverter.title: Aton-Nif Converter
atonNifConverter.description: Converts a number from the 5-Finger-Elite System to Aton-Nif and vice versa.
atonNifConverter.seoDescription: A handy converter between the 5-Finger-Elite-System (decimals) and the Aton-Nif-System.
atonNifConverter.placeholderDecode: An Aton-Nif number, that should be converted into the 5-Finger-Elite system (decimal).
atonNifConverter.placeholderEncode: A number, that should be converted from the 5-Finger-Elite system (decimal) into Aton-Nif.
atonNifConverter.aboutSeoDescription: Finally found the two missing digits.
atonNifConverter.talkLinkDescription: Here are the slides we used to present this at the Bayerwald Hackathon:

base64.title: Base64 Encoding
base64.seoDescription: Free base64 encoder / decoder, running locally in your browser.
base64.description: Translates a string into and from base64 encoding.

urlEncoding.title: URL Encoding
urlEncoding.seoDescription: Free URL encoder / decoder, running locally in your browser.
urlEncoding.description: Translates a string into and from URL encoding.

documentScanner.title: Document Scanner
documentScanner.seoDescription: Fast, free, and locally running scanner. Takes pictures of documents/papers, straightens them, and creates a PDF from them. The images are not uploaded but processed directly on the device.
documentScanner.description: Uses the camera to scan documents, straightens them and combines the results into a PDF. The images are not uploaded but processed directly on the device.
documentScanner.startScanning: Start scanning (asks for permission to use camera)
documentScanner.stillSelectingWarning:
Not all images were set to ready.
Are you sure you want to download the PDF already?

flashlight.title: Flashlight
flashlight.seoDescription: Free tool that uses the camera to activate the flashlight / torch.
flashlight.description: Uses the camera light as flashlight / torch.

errors.noPermissionGiven: Did not receive permission, to use the camera (and with it the flashlight function)!
errors.noPermissionGranted: Did not receive permission, to use the camera (and with it the flashlight function)!
